synopsis.text: Graphite Fate, a castle guard in a realm where one's abilities dictate their worth, is burdened with the seemingly useless skill 'Gluttony,' leaving him in a constant state of hunger and societal ridicule. However, when he vanquishes a group of infiltrating bandits, his life takes a drastic turn. Fate discovers that Gluttony grants him the power to consume the abilities and strength of those he defeats, awakening a newfound potential within him. As he learns to harness his newfound abilities, Fate embarks on a journey from societal outcast to formidable force, determined to shape his own destiny. Streamed in advance on Crunchyroll and U-NEXT, and broadcasted since October 2023, this captivating tale of growth and redemption unfolds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
